## Source: ossf-package-analysis (39be68a1794d85382ecb02d31e4d56c310788c3eb8f0f552d464410ec90138a5)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'azure-iothub-service-client' @ 0.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
